Audio.Locality: Serra dos Orgaos National Park. Teresopolis
Audio.Author: Jeremy Minns
Audio.Comments: Pedra do Sino trail. Montane forest. Natural song of bird high up in a 25-35m high emergent.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Pyrrhura frontalis,Streptoprocne biscutata,Thamnophilus caerulescens,Drymophila rubricollis,Chamaeza ruficauda,Xiphorhynchus fuscus,Syndactyla rufosuperciliata,Phyllomyias griseocapilla,Phyllomyias burmeisteri,Carpornis cucullata,Schiffornis virescens
